Package com.advertisementproject.userservice.service

Class RegistrationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.userservice.service.RegistrationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RegistrationService
@Service
public class RegistrationServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RegistrationService
Registration Service implementation that registers customer users or company users, as well as retrieves email details. This service enables registration controller to function.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      public CustomerUserResponse registerCustomer​(CustomerRegistrationRequest registrationRequest)
      Registers a customer user using the information supplied in the registration request. The user and customer object are validated before saved in the database.
      Specified by:
      registerCustomer in interface RegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - request object with all information needed to register a customer user.
      Returns:
      the newly registered customer user

    • registerCompany

      public CompanyUserResponse registerCompany​(CompanyRegistrationRequest registrationRequest)
      Registers a company user using the information supplied in the registration request. The user and company object are validated before saved in the database.
      Specified by:
      registerCompany in interface RegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - request object with all information needed to register a company user.
      Returns:
      the newly registered company user

    • getEmailDetails

      public EmailDetailsMessage getEmailDetails​(java.lang.String email)
      Retrieves email details for a customer/company user with the supplied email
      Specified by:
      getEmailDetails in interface RegistrationService
      Parameters:
      email - the email for which to retrieve email details
      Returns:
      email details for the supplied email
